STEP 10 - Searching for preset [token=preset_token1] STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Removing preset [token=preset_token1] from profile [token=media_profile2] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Getting presets for profile [token=media_profile2] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Searching for preset [token=preset_token1] STEP PASSED
